ABSORB + LOCK STRIP helps trap dirt & grime deep in pad so it doesn't get pushed around.
Designed to give you a great clean and act as a hardwood floor cleaner, laminate floor cleaner, and tile cleaner.
This floor mop is safe on all finished wood floors. Do not use on unfinished, oiled or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles or carpeted floors because they may be water sensitive.
body.description: Swiffer WetJet Floor Spray Mop gives you a great clean on virtually any floor in your home. With a unique dual nozzle sprayer, this all in one mopping system breaks up and dissolves tough messes for a powerful clean. Its cleaning solution loosens dirt and lifts it off the floor, pulling dirt and grime into the WetJet pad and locking it away for good. The ABSORB + LOCK STRIP helps trap dirt & grime deep in the pad so it doesn't get pushed around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Swiffer WetJet Hardwood and Floor Spray Mop Cleaner Starter Kit is a game-changer for anyone seeking a hassle-free and effective solution for cleaning hardwood and other floor surfaces. This all-in-one kit combines convenience, efficiency, and innovation, making it a must-have for households looking to simplify their cleaning routine.The Power Mop included in the kit is a marvel of design. Compact, lightweight, and ergonomically designed, it effortlessly glides across floors, reaching into corners and tight spaces with ease. The addition of batteries ensures continuous power, eliminating the need for cords and making the cleaning process not only efficient but also incredibly convenient.The kit's inclusion of 10 pads is a thoughtful touch. These pads are highly effective at trapping and locking away dirt, dust, and grime, providing a thorough clean with each pass. The pad replacement process is quick and straightforward, allowing for uninterrupted cleaning sessions. The result is a sparkling clean floor without the labor-intensive effort typically associated with mopping.The cleaning solution is a game-changer. Specially formulated for hardwood and various floor types, it not only cleans but also leaves behind a fresh and pleasant fragrance. The spray mechanism on the mop ensures an even distribution of the cleaning solution, preventing overuse and promoting cost-effective cleaning.As a starter kit, Swiffer has left no stone unturned. The inclusion of everything needed for immediate use, from the mop and pads to the cleaning solution and batteries, reflects a commitment to customer satisfaction. It's a thoughtful approach that sets this kit apart from others on the market.The Swiffer WetJet Hardwood and Floor Spray Mop Cleaner Starter Kit has seamlessly integrated convenience and performance. It has transformed the often tedious task of floor cleaning into a quick and enjoyable experience. If you're looking for a reliable, efficient, and user-friendly solution to maintain your floors' cleanliness, this starter kit is an investment worth making. Say goodbye to traditional mops and buckets – Swiffer has redefined the way we clean our floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top Tier Cleaning Product
reviews.reviewText: I have tried tons of mops and this one is by far my favorite.I recently purchased the Swiffer Jet, and it has significantly changed my cleaning routine for the better. I have tried tons of mops and this one is by far my favorite. Here's my experience with the product:Ease of Assembly and Use: The Swiffer Jet was incredibly easy to assemble right out of the box. The instructions were clear, and I had it ready to use in just a few minutes. The design is user-friendly, and the lightweight nature of the mop makes it easy to maneuver around furniture and tight corners.Cleaning Efficiency: The cleaning pads are quite effective at picking up dirt, dust, and hair from my hardwood and tiled floors. The spray mechanism dispenses just the right amount of cleaning solution, ensuring that the floors are not overly wet, which is a big plus for hardwood surfaces.Scent and Cleaning Solution: The cleaning solution that comes with the Swiffer Jet leaves a fresh and clean scent without being overpowering. It does a good job of handling light to medium floor dirt, but for tougher stains, I sometimes need to go over the area a few times.Cost-Effectiveness: While the Swiffer Jet is reasonably priced, the recurring cost of purchasing replacement cleaning pads and solution can add up. However, for the convenience and time saved, I find it to be a worthwhile investment.Environmental Considerations: I do have concerns about the disposable nature of the cleaning pads in terms of environmental impact. I hope to see more sustainable, reusable options from the brand in the future.Overall Satisfaction: The Swiffer Jet has made my cleaning process much more manageable and less time-consuming. It’s perfect for quick clean-ups and maintaining clean floors throughout the week. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a hassle-free, effective floor cleaning solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First one we ordered did not turn on . We tried so many batteries but had to return it, luckily the second one came fast and works great !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well but pads need to be replaced often
reviews.reviewText: Bought the wet jet for our new vinyl flooring a couple of months ago, very easy to use but after a couple of floor cleanings the pad is very dirty and needs to be replaced. We have just purchased some reusable pads that we will be trying out soon. But using the wet jet is fast and easy to clean the vinyl floors in our living room , kitchen and dining room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Lazy ones
reviews.reviewText: Ok I do not like washing my kitchen tiled floor but this is so easy and effort less to use. It does a great job with no effort if you have a stubborn caked on spot you may have to use a scrub pad I put it down put mop on top gone, I have only done this twice and have used it 5 times on my floor. The most important thing my wife loves it because I use it a lot and at 72 yrs old it goes fast and easy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Took a minute to figure out how to install the cleaning solution, but once done, it works very well. I use it on my hardwood floors, which are then shiny clean. My dogs aren’t bothered by the solution or it’s scent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Won’t buy again. Back to the rag mop for me. Stopped working after a couple of months.

reviews.reviewText: I bought this item under the assumption that it wouldn’t work. I put that aside and ordered one. I must say it does a very good job. It cleans your floors very well. I like that you control the amount of cleaner to use while mopping. It’s easy to use. I had a little problem assembling it but that’s because I refuse to read instructions. My only complaint is that it requires two AA batteries to use it. My complaint does not relate to having to use batteries but rather that the batteries don’t come with it. I was especially disappointed when I was set to use it and learned that they weren’t included. I don’t keep batteries in quantity around the house so I would have appreciated it coming with them. Having said all of that I’d still buy another one. It’s seems pretty well made so I expect it should last a while. I recommend it,

We have a smallish 2 bed villa and the small bottle of cleaning fluid only just completed the task. When I went to price follow up containers the only size they were selling were 2 x 1L bottles which were fine but @ A$160 these would last a very short time also. The Swiffer “machine” was great and did a brilliant job. Could not refil the cleaning fluid container with further Swiffer cleaning fluid due to a very well glued on lid. Not kosher. Nothing was explained in the promo spiel. Wouldn’t recommend unless they changed the cost of the “special” bottled liquid to clean the floors and dropped the price of the dawn soap and water liquid in the refil bottles.
Super easy to use, my second Swiffer, always works great

reviews.reviewTitle: Used to have small lights at the front but mine doesn't but it still works great!
reviews.reviewText: This mop cleans very well. It used to have little lights on the front, making it easier to see where the spray cleaner is going, but mine doesn't. It only uses two batteries and the old ones had 4 batteries, therefore two of the batteries made the light work. Don't know why they changed this feature.
